item.title: Codeanywhere IDE
item.description: Now that I’ve decided to use Hugo as my website generator and GitHub as my hosting, the next step is to create a development enviornment to create the site. Setting up a development environment can be a bit daunting if you haven’t done it before. But there are cloud based IDE or Integrated Development Environment, that can help with that. For my blog site, I’ve decided to use Codeanywhere as my cloud-based IDE.

Welcome! I’m George. I am a project manager, and I love good designs that are simple while solving complicated problems. I am always exploring how the evolution of technology can cause better, simpler solutions to come about that wouldn’t have been possible before. the winding road are my explorations and learnings. A brief 411. I been a project manager in a wide varity of industries, from aerospace to health insurance to retail.
